description: This file provides a stub implementation for OIDC security handling within a FastAPI application. It defines data structures for OIDC settings, an interface for token verification and role mapping, and functions to retrieve the current principal and settings, with options for stub-based development or future real OIDC validation.

classes.name: OIDCSettings
classes.description: Dataclass representing OIDC configuration parameters, including issuer, client ID, audience, and JWKS URI.

classes.name: OIDCVerifier
classes.description: A stub interface class for verifying and parsing OIDC tokens, and mapping roles from claims. Not yet implemented.

methods.name: _parse_roles_csv
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string into a list of Role objects.
